mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WATCHLIST (member_id, stock_id, added_at) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{stockId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT w.watchlist_id as watchlistId, w.member_id as memberId, w.stock_id as stockId, w.added_at as addedAt, s.stock_code as stockCode, s.stock_name as stockName, s.market_type as marketType, s.industry as industry FROM WATCHLIST w INNER JOIN STOCK s ON w.stock_id = s.stock_id WHERE w.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY w.added_at DESC
